author: elecharny
msg: Added the getTextValue() that ensure the returned String is never null. It takes either a String or an Int as a parameter. if an Int is passed, and if it's equal to 0, "" is produced.

author: markt
msg: Make the (first) reason parameter parsing failed available as a request attribute and then use it to provide a better status code via the FailedRequstFilter (if configured).

author: jpountz
msg: LUCENE-6708: TopFieldCollector does not compute the score several times on the same document anymore.

author: joern
msg: Thanks to Anthony Beylerian  for providing a patch!
